alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 07 at 1:31AM PST until February 08 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Peola, Anatone, Pomeroy, Cloverland Road, Mountain Road, Clarkston, and Alpowa Summit. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations above 4000 feet in the Blue Mountains may experience blowing and drifting snow with mountain snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Northeast Blue Mountains
